00035 void __inline__ eeprom_tiny_delay(void) {
00036         for (volatile unsigned char i=0;i<15;i++)
00037                 __asm__ __volatile__("nop");
00038 }
00039 
00043 unsigned char eeprom_m24_write_byte(unsigned int eeprom_address, unsigned char value) {
00044         unsigned char temp[3];
00045         temp[0] = ((eeprom_address & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00046         temp[1] = eeprom_address & 0x00FF;
00047         temp[2] = value;
00048         
00049         unsigned char retval = I2C_OK;
00050 
00051         // disable TWI interrupt
00052         cbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00053 
00054         // send start condition
00055         i2cSendStart();
00056         i2cWaitForComplete();
00057 
00058         // send device address with write
00059         i2cSendByte((EEPROM_M24_ADDR & 0xFE));
00060         i2cWaitForComplete();
00061 
00062         // check if device is present and live
00063         if(inb(TWSR) == TW_MT_SLA_ACK)
00064         {
00065                         i2cSendByte(temp[0]);
00066                         i2cWaitForComplete();
00067                         
00068                         i2cSendByte(temp[1]);
00069                         i2cWaitForComplete();
00070                         
00071                         i2cSendByte(temp[2]);
00072                         i2cWaitForComplete();
00073         }
00074         else
00075         {
00076                 // device did not ACK it's address,
00077                 // data will not be transferred
00078                 // return error
00079                 retval = I2C_ERROR_NODEV;
00080         }
00081 
00082         // transmit stop condition
00083         // leave with TWEA on for slave receiving
00084         i2cSendStop();
00085         while( !(inb(TWCR) & BV(TWSTO)) );
00086 
00087         // enable TWI interrupt
00088         sbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00089 
00090         return retval;
00091 }
00092 
00096 unsigned char eeprom_m24_read_byte(unsigned int eeprom_address) {
00097         unsigned char temp_addr[2];
00098         
00099         temp_addr[0] = ((eeprom_address & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00100         temp_addr[1] = eeprom_address & 0x00FF;
00101         
00102         unsigned char data = 0;
00103         
00104         // disable TWI interrupt
00105         cbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00106 
00107         // send start condition
00108         i2cSendStart();
00109         i2cWaitForComplete();
00110 
00111         // send device address with read
00112         i2cSendByte(EEPROM_M24_ADDR & 0xFE);
00113         i2cWaitForComplete();   
00114         
00115         i2cSendByte(temp_addr[0]);
00116         i2cWaitForComplete();   
00117         i2cSendByte(temp_addr[1]);
00118         i2cWaitForComplete();   
00119         
00120         i2cSendStart();
00121         i2cWaitForComplete();
00122         
00123         i2cSendByte(EEPROM_M24_ADDR | 0x01);
00124         i2cWaitForComplete();   
00125         
00126         // check if device is present and live
00127         if(inb(TWSR) == TW_MR_SLA_ACK) {
00128                 // accept receive data and ack it
00129                 i2cReceiveByte(FALSE);
00130                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00131                 data = i2cGetReceivedByte();
00132         }
00133         
00134         i2cSendStop();
00135 
00136         // enable TWI interrupt
00137         sbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00138 
00139         return(data);
00140 }

00146 unsigned char eeprom_m24_write_block(unsigned int start_address, unsigned int length, unsigned char *data) {
00147         
00148         unsigned int current_address,last_address;
00149         unsigned char retval = I2C_OK;
00150 
00151         // disable TWI interrupt
00152         cbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00153 
00154         current_address = start_address;
00155         
00156         while(length > 0) {
00157                 last_address = current_address;
00158                 
00159                 // send start condition
00160                 i2cSendStart();
00161                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00162         
00163                 // send device address with write
00164                 i2cSendByte((EEPROM_M24_ADDR & 0xFE));
00165                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00166         
00167                 // check if device is present and live
00168                 if(inb(TWSR) == TW_MT_SLA_ACK)
00169                 {
00170                         i2cSendByte((current_address & 0xFF00)>>8);
00171                         i2cWaitForComplete();
00172                         
00173                         i2cSendByte((current_address & 0x00FF));
00174                         i2cWaitForComplete();
00175         
00176                         while (length > 0) {
00177                                 i2cSendByte(*(data+(current_address-start_address)));
00178                                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00179                                 current_address++;
00180                                 
00181                                 length--;
00182                                 
00183                                 //If we are about to wrap around a page
00184                                 if ((current_address & 0xFFC0) != (last_address & 0xFFC0)) {
00185                                         break;
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188                 }
00189                 else
00190                 {
00191                         // device did not ACK it's address,
00192                         // data will not be transferred
00193                         // return error
00194                         retval = I2C_ERROR_NODEV;
00195                 }
00196         
00197                 // transmit stop condition
00198                 // leave with TWEA on for slave receiving
00199                 i2cSendStop();
00200                 while( !(inb(TWCR) & BV(TWSTO)) );
00201                 
00202                 eeprom_tiny_delay();
00203         }
00204 
00205         // enable TWI interrupt
00206         sbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00207 
00208         return retval;
00209 }

00215 unsigned char eeprom_m24_read_block(unsigned int start_address, unsigned int length, unsigned char *data) {
00216 //      if ((start_address & 0xFFC0) != ((start_address+length) & 0xFFC0)) 
00217         unsigned char temp_addr[2];
00218         
00219         temp_addr[0] = ((start_address & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00220         temp_addr[1] = start_address & 0x00FF;
00221         
00222         unsigned int current_address = start_address,last_address = start_address;
00223         
00224         unsigned char ptr_pos=0;
00225         
00226         unsigned char retval = I2C_OK;
00227         
00228         // disable TWI interrupt
00229         cbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00230         
00231         while(length > 0) {
00232                 last_address = current_address;
00233                 // send start condition
00234                 i2cSendStart();
00235                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00236         
00237                 // send device address with read
00238                 i2cSendByte(EEPROM_M24_ADDR & 0xFE);
00239                 i2cWaitForComplete();   
00240                 
00241                 i2cSendByte((current_address & 0xFF00)>>8);
00242                 i2cWaitForComplete();   
00243                 i2cSendByte(current_address & 0x00FF);
00244                 i2cWaitForComplete();   
00245                 
00246                 i2cSendStart();
00247                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00248                 
00249                 i2cSendByte(EEPROM_M24_ADDR | 0x01);
00250                 i2cWaitForComplete();   
00251                 // check if device is present and live
00252                 if(inb(TWSR) == TW_MR_SLA_ACK) {
00253                         // accept receive data and ack it
00254                         while(length > 1)
00255                         {
00256                                 i2cReceiveByte(TRUE);
00257                                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00258                                 *(data+ptr_pos++) = i2cGetReceivedByte();
00259                                 
00260                                 // decrement length
00261                                 length--;
00262                                 current_address++;
00263                                 
00264                                 //If we are about to wrap around a page
00265                                 if ((current_address & 0xFFC0) != (last_address & 0xFFC0)) {
00266                                         //TODO: Finish this wrap option
00267                                         break;
00268                                 }
00269                         }
00270                 }
00271                 else
00272                         retval = I2C_ERROR_NODEV;
00273                 
00274                 i2cReceiveByte(FALSE);
00275                 i2cWaitForComplete();
00276                 *(data+ptr_pos++) = i2cGetReceivedByte();
00277                 length--;
00278                 current_address++;
00279                 
00280                 i2cSendStop();
00281         }
00282 
00283         // enable TWI interrupt
00284         sbi(TWCR, TWIE);
00285 
00286         return(retval);
00287 }
